p: Re-encoded strains YFV rTs1, rTs2, and rTs3, were designed by introducing increasing numbers of ‘simple’ transitions (siTs) in the CDS of the reference strain Asibi (AY640589). The term ‘simple’ refers to synonymous, non-specific (no CpG/UpA introduction) mutations located outside putative secondary structures. Strain YFV rTs4 included all mutations of YFV rTs3 and 388 additional non-specific transitions located between position 6,846 and 9,765 of the CDS, (741 transitions in total).
